NEW YORK
WORLD'S FAIR 1 939

CITY OF NEW YORK
MUNICIPAL BROADCASTING SYSTEM
MUNICIPAL BUILDING
WORTH 2-5600
March 5, 1940
Mr* Frank E. Schcoley,
Station WILL,
University of Illinois,
Urbana, Illinois.
My dear Frank:
Thanks for the Milwaukee Post clip.
The attorney for the Victor people called me on the phone
about the Victor credit line that you mentioned. I had a long talk with
him and he insists that there is no intention on their part to hold any
of the educational stations to a strict compliance with the rule. I told
him that I was going to pass it on to you and he urged that, if at all
possible, I call you on the phone so that I can explain the spirit of our
conversation, I promised that I will, and I hope that by the time this
reaches you, we have had our talk.
Director.
MSU/cb
"New York City’s Own Station”—810 Kc.
